original_title: 2012 Big Bang Live Concert [Alive Tour in Seoul]
overview: Following the release of their fifth mini-album Alive, Big Bang set off on their 2012 Alive world tour, kicking off at the Olympic Gymnastics Stadium in Seoul on March 2-4. The group put on a spectacular show filled with their hit songs like Bad Boy, Blue, Fantastic Baby and the eternal favorite Lies. The bonus disc contains making-of and multi-angle footage.
title: 2012 Big Bang Live Concert [Alive Tour in Seoul]
